name: v2.0298
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0298 ( CP Range Type)

allowed_values.display: Flat-rate. Apply the entire price to this interval, do not pro-rate the price if the full interval has not occurred/been consumed
Pro-rate. Apply this price to this interval, pro-rated by whatever portion of the interval has occurred/been consumed
